條.definition: strip; item; article; clause (of law or treaty); classifier for long thin things (ribbon, river, road, trousers etc)

條件.definition: condition; circumstance; term; factor; requirement; prerequisite; qualification; situation; state; condition; CL:個|个[ge4]

條例.definition: regulations; rules; code of conduct; ordinances; statutes

條分縷析.definition: to analyze thoroughly, point by point (idiom)

條子.definition: short note; slip of paper; stripe; (slang) cop; (old) prostitute

條幅.definition: wall scroll (for painting or calligraphy); banner

條播.definition: to drill (i.e. plant seeds in spaced rows)

條文.definition: clause; explanatory section in a document

條暢.definition: orderly and logical (of writing); luxuriant; flourishing; prosperous

條條大路通羅馬.pinyin: tiao2 tiao2 da4 lu4 tong1 Luo2 ma3
條條大路通羅馬.definition: all roads lead to Rome; use different means to obtain the same result (idiom)

條條框框.definition: fixed framework (idiom); restriction of social conventions and taboos (usually derogatory); regulations and restrictions

條款.definition: clause (of contract or law); CL:項|项[xiang4]

條目.definition: clauses and sub-clauses (in formal document); entry (in a dictionary, encyclopedia etc)

條紋噪鶥.definition: (bird species of China) striated laughingthrush (Grammatoptila striata)

條陳.definition: to lay out (an argument) item by item; memorandum to a superior
